title: Bed Sheet, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique:  bobbin lace insertion sewn between pieces of linen to form a sheet, withdrawn element work around the outer edges
creditline: Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper Hewitt and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds and through gift of Mrs. Edward Stern

tombstone.epitaph:
Bed Sheet, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: linen
Technique:  bobbin lace insertion sewn between pieces of linen to form a sheet, withdrawn element work around the outer edges. Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper Hewitt and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds and through gift of Mrs. Edward Stern. 1994-91-1.
